00073 template <class BaseObject>
00074 bool TWeightedFeatureWrap<BaseObject>::Serialize(iser::IArchive& archive)
00075 {
00076        istd::CChangeNotifier notifier(archive.IsStoring()? NULL: this);
00077 
00078        bool retVal = true;
00079 
00080        retVal = retVal && BaseClass::Serialize(archive);
00081        retVal = retVal && BaseClass2::Serialize(archive);
00082 
00083        iser::CArchiveTag weightTag("Weight", "Weight");
00084        retVal = retVal && archive.BeginTag(weightTag);
00085        retVal = retVal && archive.Process(m_weight);
00086        retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(weightTag);
00087 
00088        return retVal;
00089 }
